title: Witness Patrol
description: Per-rig worker monitor patrol loop with progressive nudging.

title: Set up GitHub Actions build CI
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Create .github/workflows/build.yml:
- Trigger on pull requests
- Run xcodebuild or swift build
- Fail PR if build fails
- No tests required, just build verification

title: Implement Claude Code CLI service
description:
Create PromptService that shells out to Claude Code CLI:
- Run 'claude' command with appropriate prompts
- Parse JSON response for primary/strict/exploratory variants
- Handle errors gracefully
- Stream output support if possible

title: Implement Prompter MVP with Claude Code integration
description:
Implement the full Prompter spec as a macOS menu bar app. Key requirements:
1. Use Claude Code CLI as primary LLM backend (shell out to 'claude' command)
2. Complete Xcode project with build infrastructure
3. All UI components from spec (MainView, SettingsView, templates, history)
4. Build scripts + README for clean checkout builds
5. GitHub Actions CI for build gating on PRs

title: Create Xcode project structure with build scripts
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Create a proper Xcode project structure for the Prompter macOS app:
- Package.swift or .xcodeproj for building
- Info.plist with LSUIElement=true (agent app)
- Build script: ./build.sh (or make)
- Document build process in README.md
- Ensure xcodebuild can build from clean checkout

title: Complete SwiftUI views and data models
description:
Implement remaining UI components per spec:
- MainView with input field, tabs (Primary/Strict/Exploratory), history sidebar
- SettingsView for API key management and hotkey config
- PromptHistory and CustomTemplate SwiftData models
- Template system with default templates
